name: champs-libres/persona-user-bundle
description: This bundle brings authentication with the amazing [Persona system](https://www.mozilla.org/en-US/persona/) into symfony projects.  This bundle may be used by itself: you do not need to use another bundle. You may create users 'on the fly': they will simply click the 'login or register' button and will have (if you need it) a form.
